name: Laser Man
description:
One day Mr. Bean go for a walk and saw radioactive laser then he became a laser man.

Mr. Bean starts protect world from evil robots that want invade the world. 

Here his first mission! You need to find very dangerous black substance from another dimension. This substance will allow robots to make incredible armies and you need to stop them!

Good Luck and always remember that strange words: 

WASD - movement,  LMB - shoot ,  Shift - speed boost, [UNDEFINED_BUTTON] - heal

 DO NOT INPUT ESC IT BREAKS GAME

Credits:

Art - asasin56

Programming - mazamystro/ Mario Mingoia

Music - Cups
